name: Puzzles Collection
description:
Sure to be appreciated by anyone who likes Jigsaw puzzles, this game features four difficulty levels, the ability for pieces to be rotated (or not), awesome visual effects and sound, a soothing music soundtrack and over 12 puzzles! Features images of scenic destinations, interesting people, and animals, plants and more. With over 12 puzzles to solve, this game will keep you entertained for a very long time. 

* 12 Puzzles 

* 3 Difficulty levels 

* Easy: 35 Pieces 

* Medium: 48 Pieces 

* Hard: 165 Pieces 

* Soothing musical sound track 

* Optionally rotated pieces 

* Special visual effects 

* Turn sound and/or music on and off
